content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Bo Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Bo Li from China

content: Hello, Bo Li. It's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you can appreciate the prime location and amenities this apartment offers. Let's discuss the rental price that would make both of us satisfied. How much were you considering to pay?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you, Mister Heine. I am looking for a competitive price that reflects the value of the apartment. I would like to propose a starting point of 1500 Euro per month. Is this within your range of consideration?
name: Bo Li from China

content: Bo Li, your offer of 1500 Euro per month is quite reasonable, but considering the exceptional condition of the apartment and its central location, I was hoping for something closer to 1800 Euro per month. What do you think about this counter-offer?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Mister Heine, your counter-offer of 1800 Euro per month is quite high for me. While I appreciate the apartment's condition and location, I am seeking a more affordable option. Would you be willing to lower your price to 1600 Euro per month? This would be more in line with the market rate for similar apartments in the area.
name: Bo Li from China

content: Bo Li, your suggestion of 1600 Euro per month is more in line with my expectations. The apartment does require a certain level of maintenance, which I'm willing to cover, considering the price. I believe this would be a fair arrangement for both of us. Would you agree to this price?
name: Heinrich Heine
